title: NYC Identity at Graphic Hug
content:
[Graphic Hug](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121120905/http:/www.graphichug.com/) has a great post on the NYC identity program. Beautiful type. Beautiful blog.

author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content: Looks great, however i really cant stand the actual place
Luckily some of us who live here love it.
